thread.title: Sun worshipers warned the mild snap is over
thread.title_full: Sun worshipers warned the mild snap is over

title: Sun worshipers warned the mild snap is over
text: Winter is on its way back! Sun worshipers are warned that the mild snap is over with snow, gales and rain set to arrive this week Yesterday Kew Gardens in London recorded 65F (18.3C), making it the hottest February 20 on record It was the seventh warmest winter day on record but most areas were beneath drizzly skies But the fleeting glimpse of spring is set to be blown away by 50mph winds and rain later this week Potentially severe gales are expected for Orkney and the north coast of Scotland with gales in the South
